text: Thanks for joining us and #WomenWithWarren in Nevada, @YNB! I’m grateful to be with you in this fight for big, structural change. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ8QAeVX0AElKKi.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ8QAeRXUAc7Jtp.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ8QAeQXYAEiit_.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ8QAeQW4AI02Bc.jpg

A budget is a reflection of our values. Trump proposed cuts to Medicaid, student loan assistance, Social Security Disability Insurance, medical research, nutrition assistance, and more—but included an additional $2 billion for his useless wall. It’s downright heartless.

Families in Las Vegas, Nevada, and all across the country are ready to fight for big, structural change. #NVertheless, we persist. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ8xldJWoAA6RO8.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ8xldHWAAAGL_6.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ8xldHXsAEUjUt.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ8xldIXkAAAPTT.jpg

Jordan should still be with us today. My heart is with @LucyMcBath and Jordan's friends and family. I will fight beside you to end the gun violence epidemic and fight systemic racism, so that young Black boys can grow up safe and free. https://twitter.com/lucymcbath/status/1229094469607329792 QT @lucymcbath Today is my son Jordan’s 25th birthday. I often think about what I would say to him if he were still here with us. 

This year, I wanted to share a message that I wrote to Jordan on what would have been his 25th birthday. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ6e53lXsAA3ZDa.jpg

We won’t stand for this blatant attempt to intimidate immigrant communities.

To those communities in California: I see you, I'm with you, and I will continue to fight for you. You are not alone. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/02/14/us/Border-Patrol-ICE-Sanctuary-Cities.html
Our Congressional delegation came to #MSC2020 to deliver the message that the U.S. commitment to NATO and the transatlantic alliance is ironclad. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ7FlHxWoAw03F-.jpg

I’m running against some folks who are billionaires.

I’m also running against others who aren’t billionaires, but get funding from billionaires.

You cannot change a corrupt system by taking its money.
Democracy to me means one person, one vote, not Bloomberg or anybody else spending hundreds of millions of dollars trying to buy an election.

The Black/white homeownership gap is bigger now than when housing discrimination was legal, & the person rewriting our bank anti-discrimination laws ran a bank that went out of its way not to serve Black & Latino families. Housing discrimination still exists, & I'm fighting back. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1007723360472715264/img/LGvIQQOo0vHH072m.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1007723360472715264/vid/320x180/0qXBxQUBvYDIg-3U.mp4?tag=2

Self-funding billionaires like Mike Bloomberg who are running for president don’t have to think about fundraising goals—but we do.

We need to raise $7 million before the Nevada caucuses, and we’re doing it person by person. Will you chip in $3 right now? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/soc-febfr?refcode=soc-FR-ew-tw-headshot-20200216

My heart aches for the children and young adults like Kevin who are being harmed and traumatized by our immigration system. They deserve so much better. This is unethical, cruel, and inhumane—and this will stop in a Warren administration. https://www.washingtonpost.com/graphics/2020/national/immigration-therapy-reports-ice/

RT @mrdannyglover What type of society & planet do you want to leave for your children & grandchildren? Bernie will 
➡️ Create an economy that works for all
➡️ Take real action to address climate change
➡️ Set our young ppl up for success eliminating crippling student debt & narrow the wealth gap! http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1228930823975391232/pu/img/jlilttWhH9qiRn1v.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1228930823975391232/pu/vid/480x270/nDsSN2wtdj3N06KV.mp4?tag=10

Here's something that shouldn't be controversial to say: I believe in science. I believe that climate change threatens every single living thing on this planet, and that we need to act now to defeat this crisis. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ6mYbAXkAAqlYW.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1229102111809560579/vid/320x320/hNoMkl58CaMil9v0.mp4?tag=13

Join me and @ewarren tomorrow at a Mi Familia Vota town hall in Las Vegas to help get out the caucus. 

RSVP👇👇👇 https://events.elizabethwarren.com/event/235139/
Billionaires shouldn't be able to buy elections in the United States of America.

I’m so grateful to have you in my corner, @MeghinDelaney! https://twitter.com/MeghinDelaney/status/1228807263462162433 QT @MeghinDelaney Tfw you tell @ewarren you’re a caucus captain for her. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ2Zr3WVUAAzoS4.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EQ2Zr3XUwAUb8-L.jpg

I’m disgusted by reports that online lender @Upstart may be violating fair lending laws by charging higher rates to grads of HBCUs & HSIs than students from other colleges. @SenSherrodBrown, @SenatorMenendez, @SenBooker, @SenKamalaHarris & I want answers. https://www.washingtonpost.com/education/2020/02/05/where-you-attend-college-could-be-costing-you-more-borrow-refinance-education-loans-report-says/

Trump's budget proposes $1 trillion in cuts to health care programs that benefit middle class and working families, including Medicaid and the ACA.

And it does this while extending tax cuts for the top 1% and proposing billions for a pointless border wall. This is beyond absurd.

While you worked awesome deeds we could not hope for,such as had not been heard of from of old. No ear has ever heard, no eye ever seen, any God but you working such deeds for those who wait for him.

Isaiah 64:2-3

As I outlined challenges facing my Lowcountry community, she LISTENED. I believe in her working agenda for Black America and I believe in Liz! #DreamBigFightHard https://twitter.com/ewarren/status/1228824155501596672 QT @ewarren .@Benny_Starr and I took a moment in South Carolina to grab lunch at Bertha’s Kitchen and talk with voters. RT @AriFleischer This is sickening. For 99.9% of us who remember how oppressive the Soviet Union was, it’s disgusting that Bernie belonged to the fringe that praised it. Communism was a deprived system that forced people into poverty and subservience, except for the corrupt elite.  Disgusting. https://twitter.com/lindyli/status/1228717543105454089 QT @lindyli #BernieSanders lavishes praise on Communist Russia, preferring the Soviet Union to the American way of life

We live in a country which can provide literally hundreds of millions of dollars to CEOs, and yet we have teachers who have to take money out of their own pockets to buy school supplies.

If we believe in the future of this country, we have got to believe in our educators.

RT @RoKhanna Don’t let Trump claim that he's stopped endless wars. Here’s his record:

❌ Vetoed my War Powers Resolution, which would have ended our support for the war in Yemen. 

❌ Blocked my amendment to stop war with Iran. 

❌ Responsible for another failed troop surge in Afghanistan.
